article:
The 'natural environment', commonly referred to simply as the environment,
includes all living and non-living things occurring naturally on Earth.

The natural environment includes complete ecological units that function as
natural systems without massive human intervention, including all vegetation,
animals, microorganisms, soil, rocks, atmosphere and natural phenomena that
occur within their boundaries. Also part of the natural environment is universal
natural resources and physical phenomena that lack clear-cut boundaries, such as
air, water, and climate.
categories: Lists of environmental topics| List of environmental topics
